item.title: Set Construction for Romeo & Juliet
item.description: Stairs a few nights before the play In early 2020 my high school was putting on a production of Romeo & Juliet. Most of the stage equipment was provided by the school district, however, the stairs they had did not match the height of the stage. My close friend and I volunteered as we both had a few summers of construction experience. To figure out the stringer layout, I used CAD which made the whole process easy.
